name: Java
description: A widely-used object-oriented programming language for building versatile applications and software systems

name: TestNG
description: A testing framework designed for Java applications providing support for a wide range of testing needs.

name: RestAssured
description: A Java library that simplifies testing and validation of RESTful APIs with various built-in assertions.

name: Selenide
description: A concise and powerful wrapper around Selenium WebDriver for easy browser automation and testing.

name: AssertJ
description: A library of fluent assertions for Java providing a rich set of assertions to make test code more readable.

name: Spring
description: A comprehensive Java framework that simplifies the development of enterprise applications by providing built-in support for common patterns and infrastructure.

name: Spring Boot
description: A Spring-based framework that simplifies the setup and configuration of Spring applications

name: Lombok
description: A Java library that reduces boilerplate code by providing concise annotations to generate getters

name: Mockito
description: A popular Java mocking library that simplifies the creation of test doubles for unit testing and isolating dependencies.

name: Swagger
description: A suite of tools for designing and building; documenting and consuming RESTful APIs with support for OpenAPI specification.

name: Allure TestOps
description: A test management and analytics platform that helps teams visualize and analyze test results.

name: Wiremock
description: A HTTP mocking and service virtualization library for testing API integrations.

name: Unleash
description: A feature toggle system that allows for gradual rollouts and A/B testing and easy management of application features

name: Git/GitLab
description: Version control system (Git) and web-based repository management platform (GitLab) used for collaborative software development.

name: MySQL
description: A popular open-source relational database management system that supports SQL queries and transactions.

name: Kotlin
description: A modern statically-typed programming language that runs on the Java Virtual Machine (JVM) and can be used for Android development.

name: Kaspresso
description: A Kotlin-based Android testing framework that simplifies the creation of UI tests for Android applications.

name: Kakao
description: A DSL wrapper around Espresso a UI testing framework for Android designed to make tests more readable and maintainable.

name: Retrofit
description: A type-safe HTTP client for Android and Java that simplifies API communication by converting JSON data into Java objects.

name: Marathon
description: A plugin-based continuous integration and testing tool for Android applications.

name: Android Studio
description: The official integrated development environment (IDE) for Android app development

name: Xcode
description: Apple's official IDE for macOS iOS watchOS and tvOS app development.

name: XCTest
description: Apple's testing framework for Swift and Objective-C applications on iOS macOS watchOS and tvOS.

name: Swift
description: A powerful, easy-to-learn programming language developed by Apple for iOS macOS watchOS and tvOS app development.

name: Alamofire
description: A Swift-based HTTP networking library that simplifies API communication in iOS and macOS applications.

name: RxSwift
description: A Swift implementation of ReactiveX a library for composing asynchronous and event-based programs using observable sequences.

name: Nimble
description: A matcher framework for Swift and Objective-C that enhances XCTest with additional assertions and expectations.

name: Quick
description: A behavior-driven development (BDD) framework for Swift and Objective-C that promotes writing well-structured and readable tests.

name: Postman
description: A popular API development and testing tool that simplifies API design

name: Proxyman
description: A modern web debugging proxy app for macOS that allows developers to intercept and inspect HTTP(S) traffic.

name: Docker
description: A platform for developing shipping and running applications in containers providing a consistent environment across platforms.

name: Docker Swarm
description: A native clustering and orchestration tool for Docker that allows for the creation and management of Docker services and nodes.

name: Prometheus
description: An open-source monitoring and alerting toolkit designed for reliability and scalability often used with Kubernetes.

name: Grafana
description: A visualization and analytics platform for monitoring and exploring

name: Nginx
description: A high-performance web server reverse proxy and load balancer that can also be used as an HTTP cache and mail proxy.

name: Kubernetes
description: A container orchestration platform for automating deployment scaling and management of containerized applications.

name: Statsd
description: A network daemon that listens for statistics like counters and timers and sends aggregated data to one or more pluggable backend services.

name: Protobuf
description: A language-agnostic binary serialization format developed by Google for efficient and extensible data exchange between different services.

name: Golang
description: A statically-typed compiled programming language designed by Google for systems programming emphasizing simplicity and performance.

name: SQL
description: Structured Query Language a domain-specific language used for managing and querying relational databases.

name: PromQL
description: Prometheus Query Language a functional query language for time-series data used with the Prometheus monitoring system.

name: PostgreSQL
description: A powerful open-source object-relational database management system with a strong focus on extensibility and standards compliance.

name: Kafka
description: A distributed streaming platform for building real-time data pipelines and streaming applications handling high-throughput and fault-tolerance.

name: Elasticsearch
description: A distributed RESTful search and analytics engine built on Apache Lucene often used for log and event data analysis.

name: K6
description: A modern load testing tool for developers and testers offering a scriptable and scalable solution for performance testing.

name: Go Swagger
description: A toolkit for generating and consuming Swagger API documentation in Go based on the OpenAPI Specification.

name: Wireshark
description: A widely-used network protocol analyzer that allows users to see what's happening on their network at a microscopic level.
